clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in adverse effects chemotherapy anemia and chemotherapy

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: PBI 1402 is a small molecule synthetic compound with oral Bioavailability The compound activates neutrophils enhancing their survival and activation with comparable efficacy to GM CSF G CSF and EPO which are currently used to treat anemia PBI 1402 has a dual therapeutic action as a chemoprotectant and hematopoietic progenitor stimulator
